name: Sizzly ball
description:
This is short puzzle -timer game. You can select between 2 minutes or 5 minutes.

There are two circles in this game.  you play as one circle who tries to imitate the shape of the other. Change the shape of the circle by moving the mouse cursor around to get the correct shape.

If there are any issues post them down in the comments or here.

------------------------------------------------

Note

->The souce code is available and you can use it and modify it however you want but note you should not sell or publish the same code without modifications anywhere.

-> You need processing to edit the source code.

-> The game can exit if you press ESC Key.

------------------------------------------------
